it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.GUI

Class BoardGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.GUI.BoardGUI

  • public class BoardGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the jframe that is the window with all the images and the information of the match to show at the user
    Author:
    Cysko7927

        index - index where to put the weapon(0-2)
        reloaded - the weapon is loaded or not
